headline: Valero Energy (VLO): Exploring the Stock’s Valuation After Recent Momentum
summary: Valero Energy (VLO) shares have seen steady movement over the past month, with the stock rising a little over 4%. Investors watching the refining sector are curious how these recent gains compare to the company's longer history of solid total returns. See our latest analysis for Valero Energy. Valero Energy’s momentum appears to be building, with a 28% share price return over the past three months and a 38% return year-to-date, both much stronger than the 4% gain in the past month.
